list_definition.definition: to make (something) clear or easy to understand

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Can you explain the bus timetable to me?
Did she explain why she was late?

list_definition.definition: to give, or be, a reason for

All changes in social support were fully explained by depression.
